chapter1.title: Hello Traveler
chapter1.description: Enter your name then select you character. (It has no influence on the game)

chapter1a.title: Into the Darkness
chapter1a.description: You have accepted a quest to retrieve an important journal for a rich merchant. He claims his grandmother keeps it inside a chest in her cabin upon the swamp. He promised you a handsome reward and asked you to never speak of it to anyone else. You accepted and now stand before a deep darkness within the woods ahead. The eerie silence and occasional croaking are your only companion in this darkness.

choices.text: Retreat to safety and abandon the quest

chapterEND.title: You turn Back
chapterEND.description: You turn your back on the swamp, thinking you have better things to do like clean the pot your mom gave you or prepare dinner than risk you life seeking some grandma's journal in a swamp. As you walk back you pride yourself on this smart choice and say `What a smarty pants I am`

chapter3b.title: A Wise Decision
chapter3b.description: You wisely choose to retreat, heading back to safety and leaving the swamp behind.
